title: How Energy Scarcity Is Reshaping the Global Economy
summary: Recently, many people have begun talking about the US having a k-shaped economy. In it, a handful of wealthy people are doing very well financially, while many others are falling further and further behind. title: Nigeria’s NNPC Boosts Oil Production to 1.6 Million Bpd
summary: Nigeria’s state-owned oil and gas company NNPC this week reported crude oil and condensate production of 1.6 million barrels per day (bpd) for November 2025, up by 1.3% from October levels. title: Ørsted Sues Trump Administration Over Project Suspension
summary: A joint venture of Ørsted, the world’s largest offshore wind developer, has challenged in court the Trump Administration’s lease suspension order to halt work on the Revolution Wind offshore wind project off the U.S. East Coast. title: Oil Prices Open 2026 Higher as Geopolitical Risk Rises
summary: Oil prices inched higher in early Asian trading on January 2, the first trading session of 2026, as geopolitical tensions continued to provide support after the major benchmarks posted their steepest annual losses since 2020.
